evidence.claim: TAO by UpLift utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure which includes AWS Lambda and Amazon RDS for data management.
The company emphasizes HIPAA compliance, ensuring the platform meets health information security standards.
TAO by UpLift integrates with healthcare systems using HL7 and FHIR standards for data interoperability.
Their platform is designed to support healthcare transaction sets compliant with X12 standards.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction handling or EDI integration for healthcare data exchange.
